screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ser file in SER Player 1.7
screenshot.caption: SER file open in SER Player 1.7

description: SER files were originally created by only Lumenera and DMK cameras. However, as the SER format became more widespread, more digital cameras and programs adopted the format. SER files may be opened by a variety of programs, such as SER Player, FireCapture, ImagesPlus, RegiStax, SER-Reader, and PIPP.
There are several iterations of the SER format with the first two versions only supporting monochrome images. However, version 3 provides support for color images.
